text: 5.37 Luk 2.1-2 Pen kɨdek, yɨb dɨlak ñɨn ak abe, bɨ Judas Galili nɨb ak agak, Yad bɨawl yɨbɨl mɨdebin agak. Takaw apin tek nep gɨnɨgab agak. Chɨn gapman okok ayɨp penpen gɨl, kɨlop agyokɨnɨgabun agaknɨŋ, bɨ kuŋay yɨbɨl takaw nop kɨdek gɨlak agak. Anɨgelak pen, mɨd dad amɨl, bɨ anɨb ak nop paklelak kumak agak. Kumek, bɨ takaw ne agek nɨgɨlak okok, keke amnɨlak agak.
